basics.name: Xiang-lian He
basics.label: Postgraduate
basics.summary: A Chinese born girl who enjoys writing, calligraphy, and sports, and dreams of becoming an independent and powerful woman.

work.name: Nantong Chongchuan Junior High School
work.summary: Teaching at Chongchuan Junior High School in Nantong City, responsible for Chinese language teaching and class management work.

volunteer.organization: Herbalife National College Student Mini Marathon Public Welfare Challenge Activity
volunteer.summary: Completed the 5-kilometer mini marathon public welfare challenge at Jiangsu University and donated 100 yuan of public welfare funds to impoverished and deaf children.

awards.title: Qiyuan Cup Middle School Chinese Language Teacher Skills Competition
awards.summary: Participated in the Teacher Skills Competition organized by the School of Literature at Nanjing University and won awards.

publications.name: A survey of rental housing in the vicinity of Nanjing University's graduate school campus
publications.summary: Data news on the survey of rental housing for Nanjing University's master's degree program.

publications.name: The era of gig work: a survey of part-time jobs for college students
publications.summary: Data news about part-time jobs for college students at Nanjing University.

projects.name: Tencent Penguin Tutoring Operations
projects.summary: Operated a community of 6000 users, planned 12 events, and achieved first place in KPI.
